meanings.sent1: The garbage in the bin was reekier than the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The old socks were reekier than the fresh laundry.
meanings.sent3: The reekier the cheese, the more the mice were interested.
meanings.sent4: The reekier the situation became, the faster people left the room.
meanings.sent5: The reekier stench made it unbearable to stay in the room.

meanings.sent1: The reekier trash can needed to be emptied immediately.
meanings.sent2: The reekier the fish, the less appetizing it looked.
meanings.sent3: The reekier socks made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The reekier smell lingered in the air long after the source was removed.
meanings.sent5: The reekier odor filled the room, making it hard to breathe.

meanings.definition: More strongly smelling unpleasantly than something else
meanings.sent1: The reekier cheese was avoided by everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The reekier the gym locker, the quicker people moved away from it.
meanings.sent3: The reekier the socks, the more likely they were to be left behind.
meanings.sent4: The reekier the garbage, the more flies it attracted.
meanings.sent5: The reekier smell overpowered all other scents in the room.
